title: Software Change Log
description: Added a software change log that all developers may view.

title: Application Review Functions added
description: Each application should now be reviewed before it is deployed to the production system. A new 'Reviews' page is available from the application overview page. Also the application overview marks passed reviews in green.

title: Fixed: 'Back' on 'New Application' page
description: The 'back' button at the bottom of the new application page does no longer lead to a non existing page.

title: Publisher meta-field added
description: Applications and Plugins may now have a publishing organization in addition to the developing organization. Enter the publisher on the application settings page.

title: Hide security critical CHANGELOG entries
description: Text/Description from security critical entries of the changelog are not displayed online.

title: Fixed: Only consent owner may confirm!
description: Only consent owner may set consent status to active using the API. Changed for STU3 and R4.
